name: Band of Brothers: Deadly sniper
summary:
The "Band of Brothers:Deadly sniper lead players to participate in a campaign on the second war history is very important market garden, this is the largest in the world war ii with a sieve drop action;As a manager, you will be leading the 101th airborne division subordinates, to open a "hell" crowd ", so that the Allies to end this war as soon as possible.
It's an awesome fast-paced shooting game! Be careful and good luck!
